articles.title: Amazon hopes to jump-start its AI coding tool Kiro by giving it away to startups
articles.description: Can Kiro win the hearts of startup founders above the many AI coding tools they already have? Amazon hopes a free year will tempt them.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Meta poaches Apple design exec Alan Dye to lead new creative studio in Reality Labs
articles.description: Dye led Apple's user interface team for the last decade.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Could MrBeast IPO? His CEO wants fans to have ‘a chance to be owners of the company’

articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Roblox banned in Russia, local media says
articles.description: Russia's communications agency cited the presence of LGBTQ content on the platform as one of the reasons behind the ban.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Andy Jassy says Amazon’s Nvidia competitor chip is already a multibillion-dollar business
articles.description: Can any company, big or small, really topple Nvidia's AI chip dominance? Maybe not entirely, but Amazon is already making big bucks trying.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Trump administration rolls back fuel economy standards, again
articles.description: The regulatory decision would make it harder for future administrations to implement stricter fuel efficiency standards.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: WordPress’s vibe-coding experiment, Telex, has already been put to real-world use
articles.description: Though WordPress's Telex is still an experiment, the vibe-coding software has already been used to help build real-world websites.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: VCs deploy ‘kingmaking’ strategy to crown AI winners in their infancy
articles.description: While VCs have long used big investments to spur category winners, they are taking this strategy to new extremes.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: ‘End-to-end encrypted’ smart toilet camera is not actually end-to-end encrypted
articles.description: Kohler, the makers of a smart toilet camera, can access customers' data stored on its servers, and can use customers’ bowl pictures to train AI.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Company backed by Donald Trump Jr.’s firm nabs $620M government contract
articles.description: Vulcan Elements, a rare-earth magnets startup, has secured a $620 million contract from the U.S. defense department.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.description: Marquis said ransomware hackers stole reams of banking customer data, containing personal information and financial records, as well as Social
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: Energy department hands out $800M in grants for small nuclear reactors
articles.description: The Tennessee Valley Authority and Holtec were awarded substantial grants to build one reactor in Tennessee and two more in Michigan.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: AWS doubles down on custom LLMs with features meant to simplify model creation
articles.description: AWS is launching more capabilities in both Amazon Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker AI to make building custom models easier.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about Eventbrite’s acquirer
articles.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.
articles.author: Anna Heim

articles.title: Another bid to block state AI regulation has failed… for now

articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025
articles.description: Amazon Web Services giant tech conference is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

articles.title: Amazon challenges competitors with on-premises Nvidia ‘AI Factories’
articles.description: If the product name sounds familiar, it should. It's a collab with Nvidia that combines AWS tech with the chip maker's tech.
